name: sacrificial (flicko)
description:
game made for the tcr bot jam with the theme "sacrifice"

i have sacrificed my sanity and made a game in scratch on the theme "sacrifice"

u hv to "sacrifice" yourself and use ur corpse in order solve each level

controls

===========================================

a , d = move

w = jump

space = sacrifice

remember to always double click the green flag to refresh the game properly

===========================================

z = show debug
